requirements.title: Track and justify disclosures of education records
requirements.description: Maintain an auditable log for every disclosure of education records and document the legitimate educational interest or statutory exception applied.

requirements.title: Honor directory information opt-outs
requirements.description: Maintain notice and opt-out workflows for directory information and enforce suppression across exports and integrations.

requirements.title: Fulfil parent and eligible student access requests
requirements.description: Deliver education records within 45 days of a valid request and authenticate requesters before release.

requirements.title: Determine if the service targets children under 13
requirements.description: Document why the service is or is not directed to children under 13 and identify any school-authorized use cases.

requirements.title: Collect verifiable parental consent
requirements.description: Capture and document verifiable parental consent before collecting personal information from children under 13 or confirm district authority to consent.

requirements.title: Limit retention of child personal information
requirements.description: Retain personal information only as long as necessary for the educational purpose and honor deletion requests promptly.

requirements.title: Publish an internet safety policy
requirements.description: Adopt an internet safety policy covering access to inappropriate material, student safety, security, and unauthorized access.

requirements.title: Operate a technology protection measure
requirements.description: Implement and manage filtering or blocking technology on devices accessing E-Rate supported services.

requirements.title: Monitor use and provide digital citizenship education
requirements.description: Document monitoring procedures for student activity and deliver required online safety education.

requirements.title: Inventory sensitive survey content
requirements.description: Identify surveys that cover protected PPRA categories and record funding sources that trigger PPRA.

requirements.title: Provide parental notice and consent
requirements.description: Notify parents and offer opt-out or opt-in (as required) before administering covered surveys.

requirements.title: Secure and retain survey responses appropriately
requirements.description: Restrict access to survey data, enforce retention schedules, and document destruction procedures.

requirements.title: Block targeted advertising and profiling
requirements.description: Prohibit using K–12 student information for targeted advertising or profiling beyond K–12 purposes.

requirements.title: Ban sale of student personal information
requirements.description: Ensure contracts and technical controls prevent selling or renting student data.

requirements.title: Delete student information on district request
requirements.description: Provide deletion workflows to honor school or district requests when data is no longer needed.

requirements.title: Publish Data Privacy & Security Policy
requirements.description: Post and maintain the NYSED-aligned Data Privacy and Security Policy, including encryption and breach response details.

requirements.title: Provide Parent Bill of Rights
requirements.description: Distribute the Parent Bill of Rights and supplemental third-party contract disclosures.

requirements.title: Designate a Data Protection Officer
requirements.description: Assign a DPO responsible for policy compliance, incident response, and staff training.

requirements.title: Execute compliant third-party contracts
requirements.description: Ensure vendor contracts include encryption, breach notification, data minimization, and prohibition on selling student data.
